actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Claims Collection Act of 1966 to permit agencies to contract with commercial claims collection services for the collection of claims of the United States.

summary.text: Permits under the Federal Claims Collection Act, federal agencies to contract with commercial claims collection services for the collection of claims of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Claims Collection Act of 1966 to permit agencies to contract with commercial claims collection services for the collection of claims of the United States.
